name: LovePhrases
0:
”Alexa, open love phrases”
”Alexa, ask love phrases the quote of the day”
”Alexa, ask love phrases a random quote”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: love phrases
des:
Are you a romantic? Do you love quotes and aphorisms? Then this skill is perfect for you!
This skill includes:
- Carefully selected collection of quotes about love, from classical philosophers and modern writers
- The possibility of knowing the phrase of the day
- The ability to listen to a random quote within the collection
- Alexa Card support, so if you haven't heard the quote, you can read it again calmly!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
